alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Estill; Lee; Menifee; Powell; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 16 at 3:26PM EDT until May 16 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Powell County in east central Kentucky... East central Estill County in east central Kentucky... South central Menifee County in east central Kentucky... Northwestern Breathitt County in southeastern Kentucky... Northeastern Lee County in southeastern Kentucky... Wolfe County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 325 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Fitchburg, or near Stanton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Cobhill around 330 PM EDT. Pilot around 335 PM EDT. Standing Rock around 340 PM EDT. Torrent around 345 PM EDT. Booth around 350 PM EDT. Campton around 355 PM EDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.

area.areaDesc: Breathitt; Estill; Lee; Menifee; Powell; Wolfe
